name: Rancharoo
description:
You're the best rancher in the Galaxy.  You know it, the council knows it, everyone knows it.

You don't need silly looped ropes, zapping weapons, or barking furry creatures. No, you use the land itself.  That is how a real rancher herds.

Naturally, you were delighted to find this purple-ish planet with it's highly herd-able creatures.  So, you're going to do what you do best.  Herd as many of these creatures as you can, across the map.  And as every experienced rancher knows, the more you have, the worse it is.

Controls: 

LMB on ground: place wall

LMB on wall or red tree: destroy

Hint: Try leading the herd by holding lmb and drawing curves

Team:  

Bram van Elderen (Code/Art) - Website, Twitter

Brandon Gutowski (Code/Design) - Website

Kirk Markarian (Music/SFX/Art) - Website, Twitter
